newsitem.title: UK: RUGBY UNION-JONATHAN DAVIES OUT OF TEAM V SAFRICA.
newsitem.headline: RUGBY UNION-JONATHAN DAVIES OUT OF TEAM V SAFRICA.

text.p: Wales fly-half Jonathan Davies is out of Sunday's test against South Africa because of 'flu, the Welsh rugby union said on Saturday.
Davies, who returned to international rugby union against Australia last month after an eight year absence in rugby league, will be replaced by Arwel Thomas.
Arwel Thomas's place on the bench will be taken by Justin Thomas who had been due to play for Emerging Wales against South Africa A on Saturday. He is replaced in that side by Matthew Beck.
